_header: O blessed king so full of virtues
Subjects: prayers; Henry VI; patronage, pleas for
_description: A prayer to Henry VI — six 8-line stanzas (ababbcc)

Ushaw10.First Lines:
O blyssyd kynge so full of vertueþe flowr of all knyghthod
                    þat neuer was sylyd…
Ushaw10.Last Lines:
…Thys I besech at my requestNow swet kyng henre praye for
                    me
Ushaw10.Editions:
Bonney,  Edward,
                        ed.  
             “Some Prayers and Prayer-books of our Forefathers.” 
             Ushaw Magazine
         12 (1902): 279-80: 279-80.

             Henry the Sixth, a reprint of John Blacman’s Memoir.
